title: Mahindra Finance rises after stellar Q4 performance - Business Standard
content: Mahindra Finance rises after stellar Q4 performance  Business Standard
description: Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services advanced 3.71% to Rs 188.65 after the company's net profit surged to Rs 601 crore in Q4 FY22 from Rs 150 crore in Q4 FY21.
